attributes.title: pp? niiple😡
attributes.review: This is the worst app to EVER exist!! When I opened the app it glitched EVERYWHERE and told me I looked like a rat😢. Then this ugly 🍊🍊 man popped up, he looked like should be dead by now🙄. Then it started playing “we are number one” really loud it made my dog die😔, I’m definitely suing!! The poor cockroach in the corner of my room runs better than this whole app😡. This president is wack!! What is this madness?! Then it showed me a picture of Donald’s peepee 😟

attributes.title: BROKE MY PHONE!!
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. I’m so disappointed in Trump for making such a bad quality app😡. To begin with it took three days to download, when I opened it it froze my phone for TWO HOURS!!! Then my Snapchat stopped working and so did twitter, music started playing randomly I paid $300 to get my phone fixed and that app removed. 0/10 NEVER use this app.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET ALMOST DIED!!!!!
attributes.review: It took weeks to download it never works I can’t do anything it take hours to actually get into and then the app caused my phone to crash as I was working in the app it lead me to somewhere on the internet and almost got me KILLED!!!!!!!! never and I mean never download this app it should be taken down immediately it doesn’t work and it’s putting people in danger

attributes.title: What even is this app
attributes.review: Ok so I needed to see what this app is about. You know in my mind I was thinking our orange Cheeto puff can’t possibly do anything wrong. He’s perfect, but then there was this app. Not only did it make my phone glitch and pop up his nudes everywhere I went which was scaring and absolutely just horrifying, but it took THREE DAYS to download. HORRIBLE HORRIBLE app. Needs to be removed right now!!!!!

attributes.title: Terrible!!!
attributes.review: I was on this app in a coffee shop one day and as soon as I opened this app my phone shut down and started sending electric shocks to my hand. I pushed my phone away but it landed on my sons chest, where he was electrocuted. He started having seizures so we had to call the ER. This app costed me THOUSANDS of dollars. This has happened to many of my family members. You need to take this app down!!!

There’s no flavor, where is the flavorrrrr. Highly don’t recommend installing this app. So many glitches on the app. It drains your percentage. It’s ugly like his personality 🥰✨🧚🏼‍♀️💗🌈. It’s just a waste of time. You’re a waste if you support this waste 😝🧚🏼‍♀️. This app supports a rapist and a racist. DISGUSTING 😌. Dory said “just keep swimming” but not you though, you drown with this clown 🧚🏼‍♀️✨💗🌈. This app is only for clowns. Cash your dream off the clif 🧚🏼‍♀️✨💗🌈🥰💘💫🦋🎀.

attributes.title: Disgusting app
attributes.userName: c u b e t a
attributes.review: This app triggered my anxiety so much. This app took hours to download and when it finally did all my other apps stopped working and glitching out really bad. After that happened I was no longer able to contact one of my friends on Snapchat who’s cat was recently sacrificed due to this app!!! I would recommend downloading this app for any reason.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded it my phone started tweakin. It took a whole day and a half to download and when it did my phone was basically useless. Any app I went on it would lag and glitch out and I couldn’t use anything. It got all pixelated to the point where I couldn’t read anything on screen. Worst app I ever had do NOT recommend!! I’m furious

This all made me puke and barf for days because whenever I logged in i saw a fat orange pig. Who thought it was a good idea to make that thing a mascot 💀💀💀. It looks like the abomination of a nonexistent 6 legged animal that got hit so many times the eyeballs of that thing rolled out because it didn’t want to deal with it any longer. I strongly feel this app should 
✨🌸burn🌸✨ and I mean this for the sake of everyone 🧚🏽.
